name: rust-web-crawler
description: Rust Web Crawler with Tauri Desktop UI

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../src-tauri && cargo build
scripts.build:release: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../src-tauri && cargo build --release
scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd src-tauri && cargo clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean || echo 'Frontend clean not available'
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
